author: ShortCircuit
description:

Linus takes a first look at Apple’s controversial new iPhone Air. It’s thinner than ever, but comes with compromises like a single speaker and missing telephoto camera. With strong performance, a stunning display, and some genuinely clever features, does it balance out the trade-offs, or is it just Apple’s most impractical phone yet?
